svg.title: A huge 'repeatCount' (1e+309) is treated as unspecified
svg.script: promise_test(t => { let watchers = Array.from(document.getElementsByTagName('animate')).map(element => { let watcher = new EventWatcher(t, element, ['endEvent', 'repeatEvent']); return watcher.wait_for('endEvent').then(() => { assert_equals(getComputedStyle(element).fill, 'rgb(0, 128, 0)'); }); }); return Promise.all(watchers); });
